thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 22 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Balder Q4 Profit From Property Management Up At SEK 748 ‍​ Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Balder Q4 Profit From Property Management Up At SEK 748 ‍​ Mln
text:
Feb 22 (Reuters) - BALDER:
* Q4 PROFIT FROM PROPERTY MANAGEMENT SEK 748 ‍​ MILLION VERSUS SEK 650 MILLION YEAR AGO
* Q4 RENTAL INCOME SEK 1.60 BILLION VERSUS SEK 1.43 BILLION YEAR AGO
* THE BOARD INTENDS PROPOSE TO THE ANNUAL GENERAL MEETING THAT NO SHARE DIVIDEND SHALL BE DECLARED‍​
* BOARD HAS DECIDED TO ADJUST GOAL FOR THE LOAN-TO-VALUE RATIO SO THAT IT SHOULD NOT EXCEED 50 % OVER TIME Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
